sections.heading: officers; deputies; compensation
sections.text: When a county officer is compelled by the pressure of the business of the office to employ a deputy, the county commissioners may make a reasonable allowance to such a deputy.SourceR.S.1866, c. 15, ยง 6, p. 128;R.S.1913, ยง 5742;C.S.1922, ยง 5071;C.S.1929, ยง 84-808;R.S.
